original_text: The priest must go outside the camp and he must look at the person. If the disease has gone away, 4 he must speak to the person. He must tell the person that he must bring two birds. They must be birds that are good for food. The birds must be alive. They must also bring wood from the cedar tree, red wool and some hyssop.
korean_text: 제사장은 진영에서 나가 진찰할지니 그 환자에게 있던 나병 환부가 나았으면

sentences.original_text: The priest must go outside the camp
and he must look at the person
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그 사람을 살펴보아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: If the disease has gone away
he must speak to the person
that he must bring two birds
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 두 마리의 새를 가져와야 한다는 것을

sentences.original_text: They must be birds that are good for food
They must also bring wood from the cedar tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 백향목 나무를 가져와야 합니다
